title: FS LaJoie Tolstoi Back PSA 3.5 and Walsh Old Mill PSA 2

posts.post_title: FS LaJoie Tolstoi Back PSA 3.5 and Walsh Old Mill PSA 2
posts.post_content:
Raising funds for an anticipated purchase...that I really want!

Asking $1550 OBO Nap LaJoie Tolstoi 
Asking $1150 OBO Walsh Old Mill back (very rare back combo for Walsh - I believe only 10 or 11 graded btw PSA and SGC). 

Payment via PayPal f/f... if goods then pls add 3% to purchase price. 

I can email better scans for anyone interested.
